thread.title: A bird's eye view of Hawaii's Kilauea volcano

title: A bird's eye view of Hawaii's Kilauea volcano
text:
A bird's eye view of Hawaii's Kilauea volcano Sunday, May 06, 2018 - 00:50
Officials say nearly 2,000 people on Hawaii's Big Island have been evacuated from homes after lava eruptions destroyed five houses and sulphur dioxide gas threatened to harm anyone who stayed in the residential area. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
